meanings.sent1: The imperceptive child failed to notice the hidden toy under the bed.
meanings.sent2: She was imperceptive to the subtle hints he was dropping about the surprise party.
meanings.sent3: The imperceptive detective completely overlooked the crucial clue right in front of him.
meanings.sent4: Her imperceptive nature made it challenging for her to see beyond the surface of things.
meanings.sent5: The imperceptive driver failed to see the stop sign, causing a near accident.

meanings.definition: Not able to perceive or understand.
meanings.sent1: The imperceptive student struggled to grasp the complex math problem.
meanings.sent2: He remained imperceptive to the emotions of those around him, causing misunderstandings.
meanings.sent3: The imperceptive robot kept bumping into walls, unable to sense its surroundings.
meanings.sent4: Her imperceptive mind was like a closed door, shutting out new ideas and perspectives.
meanings.sent5: The imperceptive tourist wandered aimlessly, unable to navigate the unfamiliar city streets.
